title: 100-nichikan Ikita Wani
synopsis: The story centers on a crocodile living a normal life, unaware that he is due to die in 100 days. The crocodile spends ordinary days with his animal companions.
staff: [['Ueda, Shinichirou', ['Director', ' Screenplay']], ['Kogawa, Tomonori', ['Storyboard', ' Chief Animation Director']], ['Ikimonogakari', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Kameda, Seiji', ['Music']]]
